ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 206
ygData.msgSnippet: ... King Akanon was indeed a real live gnome in beta, not sure about his class though, didnt stick around and take note of his spells while I was there.  (was
ygData.messageBody:
> From: jbuckingham@...
>
> > oh, ok i heard the king was a clockwork, i mean why would a human be the
> king
> > in the land of gnomes...
>
> Morelikely it's a bug, and becasue the king gives no quests or anything
> else of importance its not high on the list of things to fix..
>
> I'm told, in the beta/early release event where all the kings came out,
> King Ak'anon was a gnome necromancer..Don't know how accurate that is,
> heard it on the paladin list, where some were using it as justification for
> killing gnomes in SolA :)

King Akanon was indeed a real live gnome in beta, not sure about his class
though, didnt stick around and take note of his spells while I was there. (was
too busy becoming addicted to eq ;)
